name: TheBigFurnace
title: The Big Furnace
author: DellAquila, kuxynator
description: A new BIG FURNACE that create a lot of plates per minute. It has 18x18 and came with 16 loaders to seems like an inline furnace.Can make 8 full belts of Plates. Only Vanilla items, suggest a mod to support. 18K iron plates per minute.
